task.title: Use Grip Array Function on Dynamic Blocks
task.shortdesc: You can array the objects in dynamic blocks by dragging and specifying the position of the grips.

context.p: Once you have selected a dynamic block contains array action, click the light blue grip on the dynamic block to display command line prompt as follows:
Array dynamic block objects by using grip

step.cmd: Select the dynamic block contains array action.
Clickon the light blue grip of the dynamic blockto highlight the selected grip.
Command line prompt appears, do either of the following:
Specify "B(Base point)" option to locate the grip for arraying.
Specify "U(Undo)" option to abort the last arraying.
Specify "X(eXit)" option to exit array manipulation.
Specify target location for grip directly.

After specifying the target location, the dynamic block will array objects towards the orientationanddisplacement along the connecting line of the selected grip (or the new base point) andthe target point.
